sys_template.name: acs_xec_fw_upgrade
sys_template.template:
change_plan=1. Run pre-change snapshots:
(echo __CHG_NUMBER__ ; echo 1) | xtp-snap
# Update repos and set upstream repository location:
1. Verify commit has made it to the system:
cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/data ; git describe --all __COMMIT__
3. Stop gateway service service exegygateway stop
4. Run puppet xpuppet -p
5. Versions prior to 3.6.2, disable exegy-getconfig: 5.1: Chkconfig exegy-getconfig off: chkconfig exegy-getconfig off service exegy-getconfig stop chkconfig --del exegy-getconfig 5.2: Upload new niit script to use local config to target edge cache: /code/ops/code/dlul.pl -u /bulk/ops/configdump/xecinitscript/xecinit.tgz {{HOSTNAME}} 5.3: Install new init script from tarball: tar xvzf /export0/install/xecinit.tgz -C / 5.4: Remove exegy-getconfig: /bin/rm -rf /etc/init.d/exegy-getconfig 5.5: Install configurations: pushd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/data/files/exegy_configs/`hostname -s` tar cf - * | (cd /usr/local/exegy/config ; tar -xf - ) popd
6. Start Exegy gateway service chkconfig exegygateway on service exegygatway start ^backout_plan=Escalate to MSE^short_description=ACS change for upgrading to firmware version: __VERSION__^u_business_objective=To update to firmware version __VERSION__^assignment_group=0148f7bb6fb7a100b13653a11c3ee41d^u_category=1daa2f626f3835005318eef11c3ee4e7^state=13^reason=^description=ACS change for firmware __VERSION__^u_expedited=false^u_expedite_justification=^u_workflow_state=^EQ
